comments.raw_text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #652002 +++
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #518343 +++

As we make TLS connections, we cache all the intermediate certs (certs other than the website's EE cert) in the certificate database, in order to reduce the odds of the user running into "incomplete cert chain" and "untrusted issuer" errors.
comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org
comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
comments.text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #652002 +++
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #518343 +++

As we make TLS connections, we cache all the intermediate certs (certs other than the website's EE cert) in the certificate database, in order to reduce the odds of the user running into "incomplete cert chain" and "untrusted issuer" errors.
